name: Bike Mania Pro
description:
BIKE MANIA

The original and most popular bike game, with MILLIONS of online plays, comes to iOS devices!


FEATURES

- Real-time biking engine.

- Two ways to bike - Tilt your device or use the specially designed Slider system.

- Bike across 100 challenging levels, in FIVE distinct worlds.

- Share your best times on Game Center. Compete with everyone around the world in 21 leaderboards.

- Takes advantage of HD RETINA display.

- Real-time weather effects (iPhone 3GS and newer, iPod 2nd generation and newer).


SUPPORTS ALL DEVICES
Supports iOS 3.0 and above (iOS 4.1 and above required for Game Center functionality).
Supports iPhone 2G / 3G / 3GS / 4 and newer, iPod 1st/ 2nd / 3rd and 4th generation and newer.
Supports iPad and iPad 2 (in emulation x2 mode).

UPDATES
v1.1
Better suspension.
Improved Controls.

v1.2
Level Pack 4 (Micro Office) 20 NEW LEVELS!

v1.3
10 NEW MILITARY LEVELS (LEVEL PACK 5!)
Level Skips - skip the levels you're stuck on!
New cinematic-style camera.
Improved Accelerometer controls.
New particle effects (engine exhaust).
Better braking/acceleration.
Performance Improvements.

v1.4
We won't annoy you about level skips anymore!

v1.5
Minor bug fixes.

v1.6
10 Brand new Levels!!
BikeMania 2 is available now on the App Store!!
